title: Vaadipulla Vaadi Lyrics Hiphop Tamizha
stanzas:
ooru oram
aalan thoppu
adhula vazhum
kiiligalin kadhai thaane.

un kadhal en katchu
un pechu en moochu
adi unnai pattri
nitham padi aachu

unkobam adhu vetpam
un ullam parisuththam
adi nee pirindha
nodiyinil endhan
uyir paspam

oru vaarthai sollava
unnidathil naan
endrendrum thurathi
varuven unnaithaan.

ennai thaedi neeyum
odi vaadi vaadi
vaadi vaadi

kaathirundha kadhalukku
solladi nalvazhi
un kadhal ennai
sedhukkidum orr uli

ah penne ennai paar
oru mutham ondru thaa
unai mattum ninaithadhu
indha idhayam allava
azha vaa

siru kanneer thuli
endhan kannin oram.
kadhalithu
tholviutrathaal
nenjukul baaram

kanneeril vazhvathaal
naamum ingae meengalthaan
neendhithaan kadhal
endra karayai poi
seralaam

serum mun madham
endra valayil
naam vilundhaal
uyir pirindhaal
kadhal murindhaal

ingillai endraal
sorgathil naam seralaam
sorgathil nammai
saadhi madham endru
pirithaal
